verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The harvest has come
And the seeds you have sown
You will now reap.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He longs to bestow
On you, His son
His joy, so do not weep.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though the winter may come,
You're set to go on,
For there will be a spring.
Though the winter may come,
You're set to go on,
For there will be a spring.
